title: Edgewater Landing close to shores and downtown!!!
map_address: 1330-1350 West Blvd. near Detroit ave- Clifton Blvd
posting_body: ['Join Our Waitlist now!!', 'Our apartments go fast at our community!', 'We are taking on applications for our studio suites, one-bedroom suites and two-bedrooms suites.', 'Availability upcoming during the summer and fall.', 'Rent rates ranging from $651 to $1036.', 'Call and schedule your tour now to submit your application for approval.', 'Edgewater Landing features totally updated suites located in the city of Cleveland just two blocks away from the shores of Lake Erie and Edgewater Park, not more than a five-minute drive to all that downtown has to offer.', 'This community is nestled amongst the historic, beautiful homes and mansions of the distinctive West Boulevard.', 'We also offer convenient online rental payment and maintenance requests.', 'Visit Edgewater Landing today and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for!', 'You will enjoy the conveniences of:', 'Renovated apartments', 'High-speed internet access', 'Friendly staff', 'Off-street parking', 'Sparkling outdoor pool with sundeck', 'Picnic area with charcoal grills', 'On-site playground', 'Rooftop fitness center and party room', 'On-site coinless laundry facilities', 'Beautiful park-like setting', 'Five minutes from downtown', 'Easy access to RTA bus lines and major highways', '24-Hour emergency maintenance', 'Online rental payments and maintenance requests', 'Preferred Employer Program*', 'Senior discounts available', 'Pet Friendly (restrictions apply)', 'Must be 18yrs and older', 'Income must be between $2,000 and $2700', 'Must be able to pass', 'Criminal Background', 'Credit Check', 'please call', 'show contact info', 'to schedule tours']
